update JRTC_ACD_CALLINFO_STAT_DAILY
DURATION = DURATION + #{duration,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CNT = CNT + #{cnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GMT_MODIFIED = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
where UNIQUE_KEY = #{uniqueKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
